com.redhat.rhn.manager
Interface PersistOperation

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileListEditCommand, BaseKickstartCommand, BaseKickstartScriptCommand, BasePersistOperation, BaseSystemOperation, BaseTreeEditOperation, BaseUpdateChannelCommand, CancelKickstartSessionOperation, CreateFileListCommand, EditFileListCommand, FilePreservationListsCommand, KickstartActivationKeysCommand, KickstartCloneCommand, KickstartCryptoKeyCommand, KickstartDeleteCommand, KickstartEditCommand, KickstartEditPackagesCommand, KickstartFileDownloadCommand, KickstartIpCommand, KickstartLocaleCommand, KickstartOptionsCommand, KickstartPackageProfileCommand, KickstartPartitionCommand, KickstartScheduleCommand, KickstartScriptCreateCommand, KickstartScriptDeleteCommand, KickstartScriptEditCommand, KickstartTroubleshootingCommand, ProvisionVirtualInstanceCommand, ScoutConfigPushCommand, SystemDetailsCommand, TreeCreateOperation, TreeDeleteOperation, TreeEditOperation, UpdateBaseChannelCommand, UpdateChildChannelsCommand
public interface PersistOperation

PersistOperation - interface defining a way to store objects to a persistence layer. The main method is "store()" that defines the Operation for storing an Object to the db.

Method Summary
 User getUser()
          All PersistOperations must have a User object who is performing the Operation.
 ValidatorError store()
          Perform the storage Operation to the Persistence Layer.
 

Method Detail

getUser

User getUser()
All PersistOperations must have a User object who is performing the Operation.

Returns:
User performing the Operation.

store

ValidatorError store()
Perform the storage Operation to the Persistence Layer.

Returns:
ValidatorError if there was an error trying to store the object.
